item_name: Cereal, Heart to Heart, Oat Flakes & Blueberry Clusters
nf_ingredient_statement: Oat Blend (Whole Grain Oats, Oat Bran), Rice, Cane Syrup, Whole Grain Rolled Oats, Kashi Cracked Seven Grain Blend (Whole: Oats, Hard Red Wheat, Rye, Brown Rice, Triticale, Barley, Buckwheat), Brown Rice Syrup, Malt Extract, Multigrain Crisps (Whole Wheat Flour, Brown Rice Flour, Yellow Corn Flour, Dried Cane Syrup, Whole Oat Flour, Wheat Starch, Salt, Calcium Carbonate), Blueberries, Evaporated Salt, Natural Flavor, Vegetable Juice for Color, Decaffeinated Green Tea Extract, Decaffeinated White Tea Extract, Alpha Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Activin (a Trademark of San Joaquin Valley Concentrates) Grape Seed Extract, Mixed Tocopherols for Freshness, Baking Soda, Beta Carotene (Source of Vitamin A), Folic Acid, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Zinc Oxide, Vitamin B12, Ferrous Fumarate.
